pullRequest.body:
This PR adds the lemma claiming that if `X` and `Y` are independent and `(X, Y)` and `(X', Y')` are identically distributed, then `X'` and `Y'` are independent.

See the associated [Zulip topic](https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/217875-Is-there-code-for-X.3F/topic/.60IndepFun.60.20of.20.60IdentDistrib.60.20pairs).

nodes.body: Committed the changes you've suggested @JasonKYi. Thanks.
ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by JasonKYi.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9256550800/job/25462748754)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9256550800/job/25462747889)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9256550800/job/25462748436)

The AEMeasurable assumptions are unnecessary as you can get them from `IdentDistrib.aemeasurable_fst`, e.g.
```lean
example {Î¼ : Measure Î³} {Î¼' : Measure Î´} 
    {X : Î³ â†’ Î±} {X' : Î´ â†’ Î±} {Y : Î³ â†’ Î²} {Y' : Î´ â†’ Î²}
    (h_ident : IdentDistrib (fun Ï‰ â†¦ (X Ï‰, Y Ï‰)) (fun Ï‰ â†¦ (X' Ï‰, Y' Ï‰)) Î¼ Î¼') :
    AEMeasurable X Î¼ := by
    rw [(by ext; simp : X = Prod.fst âˆ˜ (fun Ï‰ â†¦ (X Ï‰, Y Ï‰)))]
    exact measurable_fst.aemeasurable.comp_aemeasurable h_ident.aemeasurable_fst
```
Done. Thank you @JasonKYi for your review.

Some golf:
```suggestion
  rw [indepFun_iff_map_prod_eq_prod_map_map _ _, â† h_ident.map_eq,
    (indepFun_iff_map_prod_eq_prod_map_map _ _).1 h_indep]
  . exact congr (congrArg Measure.prod <| (h_ident.comp measurable_fst).map_eq)
      (h_ident.comp measurable_snd).map_eq
  . exact measurable_fst.aemeasurable.comp_aemeasurable h_ident.aemeasurable_fst
  . exact measurable_snd.aemeasurable.comp_aemeasurable h_ident.aemeasurable_fst
  . exact measurable_fst.aemeasurable.comp_aemeasurable h_ident.aemeasurable_snd
  . exact measurable_snd.aemeasurable.comp_aemeasurable h_ident.aemeasurable_snd
```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion Â· exact congr (congrArg Measure.prod <| (h_ident.comp measurable_fst).map_eq) ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion Â· exact measurable_fst.aemeasurable.comp_aemeasurable h_ident.aemeasurable_fst Â· exact measurable_snd.aemeasurable.comp_aemeasurable h_ident.aemeasurable_fst Â· exact measurable_fst.aemeasurable.comp_aemeasurable h_ident.aemeasurable_snd Â· exact measurable_snd.aemeasurable.comp_aemeasurable h_ident.aemeasurable_snd ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion Â· exact measurable_fst.aemeasurable.comp_aemeasurable h_ident.aemeasurable_fst Â· exact measurable_snd.aemeasurable.comp_aemeasurable h_ident.aemeasurable_fst Â· exact measurable_fst.aemeasurable.comp_aemeasurable h_ident.aemeasurable_snd Â· exact measurable_snd.aemeasurable.comp_aemeasurable h_ident.aemeasurable_snd ```
